186009221.review:
A permadeath RPG Bullet Hell. If that doesn't sound fun then the game probably isn't for you. 
Very fun but the game has been plagued by balancing issues for its entire lifespan.
Fun in like 10-20 hour doses. Occasionally life consumingly addictive. Great game to sink 30 hours into in a few weeks then come back a year later.
Pets were the worst mechanic in 2013 and somehow they still are in 2025, however DECA has tried their hardest to improve them.

185766985.review:
Este es otro juego mas, al cual cuando era niño le invertí HORAS y HORAS de diversión.

ROTMG es un MMO, pero que no te engañe su estilo simple de 8 bits; es realmente adictivo y si no fuese por el cierre de flash player en 2019, en mi cuenta saldrían fácilmente mas de 500 horas de jugado, 500 horas en las cuales mi rutina era un bucle de despertar, jugar un poco, ir a clases, volver a casa, jugar mas, dormir y repetir.
Me hizo muy feliz el saber que lo podía seguir jugando en mi PC de bajos recursos (luego de la actualización exalt, no creí eso posible por los nuevos requisitos que pedía).

Al volver luego de varios largos años, qué fue lo que noté?
- Comunidad toxica
- Pay to win
- Menos gente debido a los cambios que se hicieron.

Pero aún y con todo esto, no cambiaría por nada a este hermoso juego.

185529494.review:
Been playing since Kongregate days on and off. 
Easy to pick up. Difficult to master. 
Reach max level in 10 minutes and then start doing bosses around the realms. Max your character. Get epic loot. Die. Repeat. 

There are some permanent through death mechanics that strengthen your character. Such as exhaltations and pets. The pets can be really cool and powerful. 

Diablo-like dungeon system that can increase chances to get loot, skins, make the dungeon safer or harder. Fun!

185443178.review:
2011 Wild Shadows era Veteran here.
Hour count isn't reflective of my true time as my main account was never bound to steam, only my testing one.

I have seen this game go through many, MANY ups and downs during my time.
When I think of the Multiboxxing era of Kabam or the Ressurection Amulet Era of Wild Shadows, All I think about is how unpromising the future looked for this MMO I loved so much.

It is an understatement to say : Deca and the Community saved this game, and it's not even close.



There are underlying problems within the game still: The quality of the servers is an easy example to point to.
The tutorial could still use a lot of work, getting a beginner in without making them a personalised player driven tutorial is still a death sentence.

Discords are still too good, but recent additions such as Moonlight Village and the Realm Rework are making solo/small group play much much more viable

But the moment one is able to overlook the core issues and appreciate the game for what it truly is, that is where it shines the most.

This Game is much better if you don't try to optimise your game time and just try to beat your own personal records.

The second you decide: ''I want to be optimal in my end-game grind'' is the exact moment the game becomes incredibly boring and to a degree, Easy.

Any achievement you make will be undermined by the fact someone can do everything you can but by themselves, probably without a pet too.

Whilst on the other hand, if you don't try to cheese the game and tackles its challenges head on as was intended by devs :
You will experience one of the most gratifying gameplay loop that has ever been conceived.

You can lose everything and still be satisfied at your own progress, find redemption in the fact you accumulated a high fame count while achieving your own personal records.

I haven't even talked about seasons, BP, crucible or daily logins : The game litteraly vomits at you everything you need if you bother on playing semi-regularly.

This issue that was a plague back in the days, basic things such as an extra character or extra vault space were all locked behind a P2W paywall, something the game is very generous about nowdays.

If you've played this and didn't give it a proper chance, I Implore you to try again and witness your own progression as a person from within this game unfold.

If you're a returning Meta discord lord, Please stop.
Get one good buddy and run the hardest dungeons, Farm the exalt dungeons manually within the realm, do a challenge run if you're that good, or be like me and run a guild aimed to help newcomers.

The game has never had this much room to be played in so many playstyles, and I'm all down for it.

Infading, out.

185152563.review:
buen juego la verdad y tanto rework lo esta reviviendo poco a poco pero tiene una comunidad muy vieja por lo que todos estamos cansados y hambrientos de nuevo contenido y el que sale no es suficiente.

Si lo quieres para pasar el rato con tus amigos descargatelo, la neta es buen juego aunque sea dificil 

PERO, en un punto del juego avanzado necesitaras hacer grupos para hacer dungeons o incluso te encontraras personas de buena voluntad que te enseñen lo que tengas que saber para tener el mejor equipo o hacer dungeons dificiles por lo que si quieres empezar el verdadero grindeo necesitas jugar con los servidores de discord y aqui viene lo malo...

Los discords y la mayoria de grupos de este juego son super elitistas, si no tienes x equipamento o no sabes hacer x mecanica no podras "entrar" en las dungeons, puedes entrar si pero con el castigo de que te vayan baneando de esos servidores y te quedes sin opcion de hacer cosas en grupo.

Puedes hacerlo con tu gremio si, pero la comunidad es muy vieja y pocos gremios funcionan y los que funcionan lo hacen atravez de esos discords.

Hacer todo solo es otra opcion pero necesitas mucho skill y experiencia lo cual aveces ni eso es suficiente para hacer las dungeon endgame a menos que sepas lo que haces.

Es una mrd la comunidad de discords lo que hace que el juego sea tambien una mrd en el endgame, llega a ser mas cosas negativas que positivas asi que ya no vale la pena jugar esto en ese punto avanzado

para pasar el rato al principio tendra que atraparte igual porque el juego es dificil para los nuevos

Not recommended.

185143942.review: Realm of the Mad God Exalt is a fast-paced, bullet-hell MMORPG that brings both excitement and challenge. The pixel art is simple but effective, and the cooperative gameplay really shines when teaming up with others. Permadeath adds a unique sense of tension and excitement to every run. While the grind can be repetitive, the action-packed gameplay makes it worthwhile. Great for those who enjoy difficult challenges and working together with others! :))

184931928.review:
I have 1k+ hours in this game but not on steam, on the standard rotmg client

The fact that all of the negative reviews have 500 or more hours will tell you everything you need to know about this game: it is extremely addictive and fun. A game combining Roguelite and MMORPG in a way never seen before. Charming graphics and environments, extremely high skill curve, insane amounts of content to explore and infinite replay-ability. Not for the faint of heart, permadeath in an MMORPG is brutal. But the thrill of grinding for rare items and getting them is unmatched. Or, you can just chill in easier areas/dungeons with some music on, enjoy the atmosphere, experiment with different builds. There are no quests, you decide what you want to do. There are definitely progress points, such as reaching lvl 20, maxing characters, exalting, improving your pet, etc. But you are still free.

The biggest downside to this game is that spending a LITTLE BIT of money is essential to the enjoyment of the game. You don't NEED to splurge on pay to win pets and keys etc. But I'd say buying 15 USD total worth of char slots, vault space, pot vault space, is literally essential to enjoying the game. After that, there are still ways to get those things without paying but it's a slow grind.

184663169.review: I've been playing this game on and off since it was a flash game, and i genuinely enjoy playing it. As much as I would like to recommend this game, I just can't. The servers crash *often* and they've been doing that for years with seemingly no attempt to fix them. Its very demotivating to have to close the game and rejoin a server (the populated server often have a queue; so more waiting), just to get stuck in an loading screen and do it all over again. The game is also heavily monetized and its shoved in your face constantly, which deters new players from giving the it a chance. If you can get past that though there is a lot to enjoy while playing this game, but with all the issues it has (and has had for many years); i cannot comfortably recommend this to new players

183982542.review:
Reality of returning to this game.

Pros: 
- Easier to get Unlocks in both characters and Vault spaces.
- Party System (this is still early phase and can still become unusable like glitching out and being able to join at all, but so far one of the best quality of life changes.)

Cons:
- All those laggy moments that you so fond of the old client flash still exist in the game.
- Laggy pots/items that gets stuck on the sceen sometimes, turning your one slot of that inventory completely unusable unless you restart your game.
- The load times when just going to vault, realm, servers and dungeons are just bad. It is common to be stuck on a infinite loading screen.

183791237.review:
Interesting F2P MMO that combines bullet hell. 
The game is pretty simple: you level up, die and rise from the ashes once again.

However, the interface is not very friendly for those who start for the first time the adventure of unlocking new classes. Although combat is very simple, there are many mechanics that are not very well explained without consulting a guide or the Wiki, such as the fame indicator that levels up every 2000 EXP.

Otherwise, this game is a lot of fun if you party with friends to do dungeon hunts or even defeat world bosses.

I do recommend this just for the social features, because there is a lot of people that will lend you a hand in tough situations but it's not very friendly towards F2P players (like me), as you somehow have to buy credits to get more inventory slots. You can get some stuff for free at the store if you are good at farming fame, trading your fame points defeating all kind of bosses and doing quests.

The exalt launcher works 50% of the time just like the steam counterpart if you’re lucky enough you might even see the bootloop of death in here making you unable to login for some days.
